skill.name: Underdog
skill.normal: When you are surrounded by three enemies or more, you receive a 10% damage bonus.
skill.ace: When you are surrounded by three enemies or more, you receive 10% less damage from enemies.

skill.name: Shotgun CQB
skill.normal: Increases your shotgun reload speed by 25%.
skill.ace: You reload shotguns 25% faster. Increases your shotgun steel sight speed by 125%.

skill.name: Shotgun Impact
skill.normal: Your weapon stability with shotguns is increased by 8.
skill.ace: You deal 35% more damage with shotguns.

skill.name: Far Away
skill.normal: Your accuracy bonus while aiming down sights with shotguns is increased by 40%.
skill.ace: You gain a 35% increased effective range when aiming down sights with shotguns.

skill.name: Close By
skill.normal: You can now hip-fire with your shotguns while sprinting.
skill.ace: Your rate of fire is increased by 35% while firing from the hip with single shot shotguns. Shotguns with magazines have their magazine size increased by 15 shells.

skill.name: Overkill
skill.normal: When you kill an enemy using a shotgun or the OVE9000 portable saw, you receive a 75% damage bonus for 10 seconds.
skill.ace: The damage bonus now applies to all weapons. Skill must still be activated using a shotgun or the OVE9000 portable saw.

skill.name: Oppressor
skill.normal: Your weapons are 75% more effective at threatening enemies.
skill.ace: Reduces the visual effect duration of flashbangs by 75%.

skill.name: Die Hard
skill.normal: You can use your primary weapon in bleedout.
skill.ace: Your armor recovery rate is increased by 15%.

skill.name: Transporter
skill.ace: You can now carry 2 bags at once.

skill.name: Bulletproof
skill.normal: The armor recovery rate of you and your crew is increased by 25%.
skill.ace: Improves your armor so you can absorb 50% more damage..

skill.name: Bullseye
skill.normal: You regenerate 15 armor for each successful headshot. This can not occur more than once every 2 seconds.
skill.ace: You regenerate an additional 30 armor for each successful headshot.

skill.name: Iron Man
skill.normal: When you melee Shield enemies, they get knocked back by the sheer force. Run and shoot â€“ you can now shoot from the hip while sprinting.
skill.ace: Unlocks the ability to wear the Improved Combined Tactical Vest.

skill.name: Stable Shot
skill.normal: You gain a 50% increased ammo box pickup range
skill.ace: Every 10th enemy you kill will drop an extra ammo box.

skill.name: Bullet Storm
skill.normal: Directly after you deploy an ammo bag, you can fire your weapon for 10 seconds without depleting your ammunition.
skill.ace: You can fire 15 seconds longer without depleting your ammunition.

skill.name: Portable Saw
skill.normal: Unlocks the OVE9000 portable saw for you to use as a secondary weapon
skill.ace: Increases your saw blade amount by 1.

skill.name: Ammunition Specialist
skill.normal: You can now place 2 ammo bags instead of just one.
skill.ace: Each ammo bag contains additional 200% ammo.

skill.name: Carbon Blade
skill.normal: You replace your saw blades with carbon blades, increasing yor saw efficiency by 40% and reducing the wear down of the blades on enemies by 50%.
skill.ace: You can now saw through shield enemies. When killing an enemy with a saw, you have a X% chance to cause nearb enemies to panic. Panic will make enemies go into short bursts of uncontrollable fear.

skill.name: Fully Loaded
skill.normal: Your total ammo capacity is increased by 25%
skill.ace: Increases the amount of ammo you gain from ammo boxes by 75%.
